text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @ericgarcetti Blame game buck stops where? if or when all at WH may get coronavirus who to blame? everyone bar one self God knows what's around corners only God knows & sometimes swamp get deeper & deeper then child like adults cry for there mother when all to late to fix.
